name: medassist
tagline: A personal medication tracking app with reminders and reports
description: MedAssist is a personal medication tracker that helps individuals log doses, reminders, and prescriptions. It includes notifications, reports, and a clean web UI for health tracking and management at home.

features.title: Medication Logging
features.description: Record when medications are taken with timestamps and dosage information

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Set up alerts for medication times to ensure doses aren't missed

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Track medications for multiple family members from a single account

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search and add medications from a comprehensive drug database

features.title: Side Effect Tracking
features.description: Log and monitor side effects or reactions to medications

features.title: Report Generation
features.description: Create medication reports for doctor visits or insurance purposes
